problem_names:
lemma zdiv_mult_self:
  \<open>m \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow> (a + m * n) div m = a div m + n\<close>
  for a m n :: int

lemma div65536: assumes "a < 256" "b < 256" "c < 256" "d < 256" 
    shows "nat ((int d + int (256 * c) + int (65536 * b) + int (16777216 * a)) div 65536 mod 256) = b"

lemma div256: assumes "a < 256" "b < 256" "c < 256" "d < 256" 
  shows "nat ((int d + int (256 * c) + int (65536 * b) + int (16777216 * a)) div 256 mod 256) = c"

lemma zdiv_mult_self:
  \<open>m \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow> (a + m * n) div m = a div m + n\<close>
  for a m n :: int

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow> (a + m * n) div m = a div m + n
by simp

lemma div65536: assumes "a < 256" "b < 256" "c < 256" "d < 256"

from zdiv_mult_self[where a="int d + int (256 * c) + int (65536 * b)" and m=65536 and n="256 * (int a)"]

picking this:
  65536 \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
  (int d + int (256 * c) + int (65536 * b) + 65536 * (256 * int a)) div
  65536 =
  (int d + int (256 * c) + int (65536 * b)) div 65536 + 256 * int a

proof (prove)
using this:
